connector_name.description: Name of configured SIPREC connector to be used.

siprec_track.description: Specifies which track should be sent on siprec session.

include_metadata_custom_headers.description: When set, custom parameters will be added as metadata (recording.session.ExtensionParameters). Otherwise, theyâ€™ll be added to sip headers.

secure.description: Controls whether to encrypt media sent to your SRS using SRTP and TLS. When set you need to configure SRS port in your connector to 5061.

session_timeout_secs.description: Sets `Session-Expires` header to the INVITE. A reinvite is sent every half the value set. Usefull for session keep alive. Minimum value is 90, set to 0 to disable.

client_state.description: Use this field to add state to every subsequent webhook. It must be a valid Base-64 encoded string.
